title: The Shirley Temple collector's classic
brief_description: A collection of film excerpts and short films starring Hollywood’s favourite child actor, Shirley Temple. The four short films are interspersed with scenes from “The Little princess”. Quality is inconsistent and there is no narration or introduction.
